wsd.ass.rest

Class LogService

  • java.lang.Object
    • wsd.ass.rest.LogService

  • public class LogService
extends Object
    Author:
    Calvin and Janette The Log Service class handles REST calls for all vehicle log related requests. Based on what URL and parameters are provided by the user, this class will return the requested information.

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LogService() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Logs getAll()
      REST call to return all log entries regardless of their statuses.
      ArrayList<Log> getDateLogs(String date)
      REST call to return all logs which commence on a certain date.
      ArrayList<Log> getKeywordLog(String keyword)
      REST call to return all log entries with the keyword in their description
      ArrayList<Log> getQuery(String vehicleRego, String startDate, String keyword)
      REST call to return all log entries which satisfy any of the three parameters: - registration number - starting date - keyword in description
      ArrayList<Log> getRegoLog(String registration)
      REST call to return all logs for a certain vehicle with matching registration number

                             throws JAXBException,

      • getQuery

        public ArrayList<Log> getQuery(String vehicleRego,
                               String startDate,
                               String keyword)
                        throws JAXBException,
                               IOException
        REST call to return all log entries which satisfy any of the three parameters: - registration number - starting date - keyword in description
        Parameters:
        rego - all log entries with for the vehicle with matching registration number
        date - the date to check against
        keyword - the keyword to search for within the log description
        Returns:
        all log entries which satisfy any or all of the parameters otherwise all log files that are not hidden
        Throws:
        JAXBException
        IOException
